controller

Class MotorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MotorController

  • public class MotorController
extends java.lang.Object
    DPM Final Project Group 15 Main - Oct 18, 2014

    Description:

      Provides abstraction layer for motors. A common interface to perform simple tasks on each motor. Simplifies left, right turns and travelling distances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MotorController()
      A controller to provide common motor functionality

        public void rotate(double theta,
          boolean waitLeft,
          boolean waitRight)
        Rotate the robot by an angle theta. Wait left and right will make the right and left motors wait for rotation to finish before continuing
